summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to an unspecified recipient, requesting a short call to discuss victim notification procedures in the Epstein case. It demonstrates ongoing case management and victim outreach efforts.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, working in the Southern District of New York, is requesting a call to discuss victim notification procedures in the Epstein case.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: An Assistant U.S. Attorney in the SDNY was coordinating victim notification procedures for the Epstein case as of June 2020.
The communication indicates ongoing administrative and victim outreach work related to the case years after Epstein's death.
The email is a direct, professional request for a discussion, highlighting the procedural aspects of the case.
